mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_COMM_STAT ( STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, STAT_CITY, STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_BW, STAT_OS, STAT_REFERER, STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID ) VALUES ( #{stat_key}, #{stat_sessid}, #{stat_key_nm}, #{stat_city}, #{stat_nat}, #{stat_nat_cd}, #{stat_bw}, #{stat_os}, #{stat_referer}, GETDATE(), #{stat_raddr}, #{stat_uid} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, UPPER(STAT_CITY) STAT_CITY, UPPER(STAT_NAT) STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_OS, STAT_BW, STAT_REFERER, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), STAT_DT, 20) STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID, dbo.SF_USER_NM(STAT_UID) STAT_UNM FROM CMS_COMM_STAT ) INNA WHERE 1 = 1
AND STAT_KEY IN ('USERMAN', 'APPLMAN')
AND STAT_KEY = #{stat_key}
AND STAT_DT BETWEEN #{srchFromDT} || ' 00:00:00' AND #{srchToDT} || ' 23:59:59'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTCNT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = #{stat_key} AND STAT_SESSID = #{stat_sessid}

WITH DLIST AS ( SELECT 1 AS ADDDT UNION ALL SELECT ADDDT + 1 FROM DLIST WHERE ADDDT <= DATEDIFF(DD, #{srchFromDT}, #{srchToDT})) SELECT '0' CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE CHARTDATA_KEY, ISNULL(CNT, 0) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), STAT_DT, 112) STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), STAT_DT, 112) BETWEEN #{srchFromDT} AND #{srchToDT}
) INNA GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DD, ADDDT - 1, #{srchFromDT}), 112) AS CTDATE FROM DLIST ) B ON A.STAT_DT = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE option (MAXRECURSION 365)

WITH DLIST AS ( SELECT 1 AS ADDDT UNION ALL SELECT ADDDT + 1 FROM DLIST WHERE ADDDT <= DATEDIFF(MM, #{srchFromDT} + '01', #{srchToDT} + '01')) SELECT '0' CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE CHARTDATA_KEY, ISNULL(CNT, 0) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), STAT_DT, 112) STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), STAT_DT, 112) BETWEEN #{srchFromDT} AND #{srchToDT}
) INNA GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), DATEADD(MM, ADDDT - 1, #{srchFromDT} + '01'), 112) AS CTDATE FROM DLIST ) B ON A.STAT_DT = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE option (MAXRECURSION 365)

WITH DLIST AS ( SELECT 1 AS ADDDT UNION ALL SELECT ADDDT + 1 FROM DLIST WHERE ADDDT <= DATEDIFF(YY, #{srchFromDT} + '0101', #{srchToDT} + '1231')) SELECT '0' CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE CHARTDATA_KEY, ISNULL(CNT, 0) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), STAT_DT, 112) STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), STAT_DT, 112) BETWEEN #{srchFromDT} AND #{srchToDT}
) INNA GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), DATEADD(YY, ADDDT - 1, #{srchFromDT} + '0101'), 112) AS CTDATE FROM DLIST ) B ON A.STAT_DT = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE option (MAXRECURSION 365)
